Thu Dec 28 03:13:44 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/libpng16-config /opt/bin/libpng16-config
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/libpng-config /opt/bin/libpng-config
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/pngfix /opt/bin/pngfix
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/bin/png-fix-itxt /opt/bin/png-fix-itxt
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include/libpng16
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/pnglibconf.h /opt/include/pnglibconf.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/png.h /opt/include/png.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/libpng16/pnglibconf.h /opt/include/libpng16/pnglibconf.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/libpng16/png.h /opt/include/libpng16/png.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/libpng16/pngconf.h /opt/include/libpng16/pngconf.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/include/pngconf.h /opt/include/pngconf.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.la /opt/lib/libpng16.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.so.16 /opt/lib/libpng16.so.16
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng.la /opt/lib/libpng.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.so.16.40.0 /opt/lib/libpng16.so.16.40.0
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng16.so /opt/lib/libpng16.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/pkgconfig/libpng16.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/libpng16.pc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/pkgconfig/libpng.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/libpng.pc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/lib/libpng.so /opt/lib/libpng.so
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man5
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man3
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/share/man/man5/png.5 /opt/share/man/man5/png.5
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/share/man/man3/libpngpf.3 /opt/share/man/man3/libpngpf.3
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libpng-1.6.40/share/man/man3/libpng.3 /opt/share/man/man3/libpng.3
